  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddBookActivity
    AddBookActivity Activity allows user to create a new book.
    AppController
    AppController Raises an small error message if can't connect to Google book api Nov.
    AuthPage
    AuthPage This class serves as the entry point for to the app for users who aren't logged in Nov.6, 2020
    Book
    Book This class creates a Book object used to store a single book's information.
    BookSearchAdapter
    BookSearchAdapter adapter for the RecyclerView in SearchActivity to allow for custom views Used to display books in the search result Nov.
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    HandleIncomingReqsActivity
    HandleIncomingReqsActivity Used to show requests from other users for a certain book owned by the current user Nov.
    IncomingReqs
    IncomingReqs This activity displays all the of the current user's books that have requests on them Nov.
    IncomingRequestsAdapter
    IncomingRequestsAdapter This class is a custom list adapter for showing current requests on a book Nov.
    isbn_search_book
    isbn_search_book Connects to Google Books Api to obtain book descriptions using the ISBN when adding a new book Nov.
    isbnAddBook
    isbnAddBook Connects to the isbn_search_book class by taking the information obtained from Google Books Api, and displaying it in the fields Nov.
    LoginActivity
    LoginActivity This class handles the input and authentication of login information Nov.6, 2020
    MainActivity
    MainActivity Main page of the app once user has signed in.
    MyAppGlideModule
    MyAppGlideModule This adds support for loading images from firebase Nov.
    NavigationListAdapter
    NavigationListAdapter basic adapter extending RecyclerView.Adapter custom ViewHolder to access our views Used to display books in the MainActivity RecyclerView
    ProfileActivity
    ProfileActivity This class is the activity for viewing and editing the current users information
    Reauth
    Reauth This dialog fragment prompts for a password and returns it on OK Nov.
    SearchActivity
    SearchActivity Allows user to search through available books to borrow, using keywords Shows results in list Nov 2, 2020
    User
    User Creates a user object to store user information Nov.
    UserSearchAdapter
    UserSearchAdapter adapter to for the RecyclerView in SearchActivity to allower for custom views Used to display users in the search result Nov.
    ViewBookActivity
    ViewBookActivity Activity that allows user to view book details, and/or edit those details depending on where this activity is being called from Nov.
